title: Captions for tables in developer docs

cells.data:
If you want to add a caption to table in developer docs, do it like this:

<table>
    <caption>Table 1: Parameters</caption>
    <thead>
        <th>Parameter</th>
        <th>Description</th>
    </thead>
    </tbody>
    etc.....

The site stylesheet will position the caption above the table, aligned left, and bolded.
